coreAttributes.name: AGL Arms 45 Long Colt
coreAttributes.description: A strange set revolver found in a desert of a far away land. It appears worn as if having been used many times.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(ready)] Long Colt and load the cylinder.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] Long Colt and empty the cylinde.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.name] in [npc.namePos] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. Ethereal rounds strike [npc2.name], causing [npc2.her] to lose energy.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.name] in [npc.namePos] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. The shot goes wide! The round hits the ground uselessly
